context: I do. I'm in the mood for a comedy from the 80's. Do you have any suggestions?
Juno (2007) is a great movie from the 80's? Let me think
That is a good movie. I like movies like Stripes (1981) .

Yes, it is nice to rewatch old movies
Of course, Ghostbusters (1984) was my favorite forever. I think I saw it 3 times when it was in the theater. I guess I love Bill Murray.
resp: Other good comedy movie is Fargo (1996) , although is from the 90's I hope you have a nice day my friend
